attributes.review: This is literally the worst app to exist on this planet. Like seriously. The glitches are absolutely ridiculous. The Cheeto Man is probably behind this. Oh wait, he is the glitch....🙅‍♀️🙅‍♀️🙅‍♀️🙅‍♀️
attributes.title: Just....just no

attributes.review: I wanted to see what this app had to offer but its just a piece of garbage, I deleted it immediately it was such a waste of my time.

attributes.review: this app is sooooooo slow and glitchy and the dude in all the pictures is just gross looking. Would not recommend 0/10.

attributes.review: I opened the app and it showed nothing but support for a fascist Cheeto who only promotes white supremacy and it kind of scarred me for life😳💀. if I could have a choice for 0 stars I’d put that.
attributes.title: Disgusting and racist

attributes.review: after i opened the app i was rudely confronted with the cheeto himself. this made me so sick that i had to immediately vomit. i absolutely will not be using this app again. i’m disgusted.
